summary: miranda doerr was shot in her missouri mobile home on monday and died in hospital .   police said the toddler was playing with her brother when the loaded gun went off .   the children 's mother , jennifer doerr , said she was in another room .   police do n't know who pulled the trigger , but consider the death accidental pending further investigation .   the six-year-old boy is in protective custody .
